website_summaries.verdict: The Western Digital My Net N900 Central makes an excellent all-in-one wireless and network storage option for home and mobile users.
pros: The Western Digital My Net N900 Central dual-band router offers a great combination of fast Wi-Fi speed, a nice networking feature set, and useful network storage
cons: The My Net N900 Central's internal hard drive can't be replaced, and the router doesn't support the new 802.11ac standard

customer_reviews.title: Good router, poor NAS storage.  WD2GO is quirky.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great router. I was intriged by the internal NAS drive but disovered it's usefulness is limited. There is only one share ("PUBLIC") and no abilty to tweak permissions. And forget using it as a destination for Windows backup. The WD2GO "private cloud" concept is marketing hype. You need to supply the router admin password everytime you link to the router. Really? And the performance is terrible. The Android W2DGO app does work though. Indeed, it actually works quite well. Why WD can't get the Windows WD2GO app to work as well is beyond me.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Harris

customer_reviews.title: New device router
customer_reviews.text: Installation was very easy and the ability to set up both bands quite painless. It worked from the get go with connectivity being seamless and easy to configure. I like the ability to generate personal pass codes for all ands and profiles. However the set up of the backup storage is harder, and ability to do backup on Microsoft outlook very painful. The dual band shows up on the wireless link but is useless over distances of more than 50 feet. In adjacent rooms it does not work hence video streaming will not work as suggested. Range limitation reduces the effectiveness of the dual band promise.
customer_reviews.author: RH

customer_reviews.title: I should have listened to the other reviews
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had not ignored the other reviews here, but thought maybe I'd be the "exception". I really wanted this to work, but after a week of playing with using the hard drive to back up my computers, I gave up. The router would also drop it's signal for no particular reason usually when I was trying to watch a movie on NetFlix. Not ready for prime time. I sent it back and got the ASUS RT-N66U Dual-Band Wireless-N900 Gigabit Router "DARK KNIGHT" and I'm very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Deville

customer_reviews.title: May work better in lower interference areas outside of town
customer_reviews.text: Had some issues with it dropping WiFi randomly, had to reboot router, it would stop shairing the interal drive. Bought a more advance modem and a separate MyBook backup drive and use this one to backup the cloud here. It still has issues with dropping availability at times but overall is a decent product. May work better in lower interference areas outside of town.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Gregg

customer_reviews.title: good router .. Avoid if you have a Mac
customer_reviews.text: Great router and excellent hard drive capability... However after owning it for almost 2 years I have not been able to get the NAS hard drive feature to play well with Mac. You can transfer files sometimes, however requests time out often and I get errors very often when transferring files to the drive. My windows laptop however works with it seamlessly It also works great as a media server for my smart tv (movies, tv shows, music, etc) Range is decent - comparable to the verizon FIOS red/black router
customer_reviews.author: Nirtej Wadwa

customer_reviews.title: Decent router and poor boy's NAS system
customer_reviews.text: This unit works fine. Nice poor boy's NAS system too. File transfers aren't very fast to/from the internal HD, but the router speeds themselves are pretty good on both bands. Does what I want it to for the most part.... Decent product for the money and featuers. The Web Based file access wd2go works well also. Use it all the time on my Android Smartphone (with App off the playstore) to get to files I want access to. Nice and reliable feature.
customer_reviews.author: Phil_the_Amazon_Guy

customer_reviews.title: Beware of Amazon Warehouse deals on this product because its very easy to pop the top off and get a free ...
customer_reviews.text: Hard drive missing on arrival. Works well enough with my own HDD. Beware of Amazon Warehouse deals on this product because its very easy to pop the top off and get a free 2TB HDD before returning it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Garrity

customer_reviews.title: WD not ready for routers
customer_reviews.text: I love Western Digital for their drives. Not this router. User interface pour. Dosen't update. It show devices on my network hours after I've left with them. Also, it only shows DHCP devices. You can add others manualy, but there is no status about them. Device locks up and now has to be rebooted 1 to 2 times a day. I could say more, but I just don't recommend it. I would like to return it, but my my window closed yesterday.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Steven D. Demaree

customer_reviews.title: Auto Streamer!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the My Net N900 Central 1TB. I cut the power cord and put a cigarette lighter adapter on (the unit runs on 12v DC so it was simple). I plug it in the car lighter socket, and it streams anything stored on the built in hard drive --wirelessly to the family tablet computers in the car. Get a DLNA app for your droid, tablet, or iThingy and you can tune in too! Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: NOT AS EASY AS  1 2 3
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use as a storage router that would never be connected to the internet. Its only purpose was to sevrve as a wireless storage unit for my iphones and ipad. It never let me come close to using it as any such device. The customer service number does not work. HORRIBLE PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: michael hord

customer_reviews.title: Return of second identical router.
customer_reviews.text: This product is unable to do a basic function of relaying photos from a pc to a media player (WDTv Live), a product made by the same manufacturer. After 1 1/2 hours on the phone with a svc tech discussing the original unit, he was unable to offer a solution and suggested that I had a bad unit and should return it. I was impressed enough with many of the features and did just that in exchange for an in kind replacement. This unit has the same inability, so I assume there is a design flaw and will replace it with a different model.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Casteran

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY UNLESS YOU VERIFY WD PROVIDED A SW FIX FOR WIFI DROPS
customer_reviews.text: There is only one problem with this device, but it is a big one. Everything is great regarding the advertised features, if only the WiFi worked without dropping out every few minutes. I didn't take the time to investigate exactly why this might be happening, there are lots of folks out there with theories but I simply wanted something that works. So I dumbed this thing down to connect only wired devices since it was too late to return it before I got the full picture of what it is like to deal with the WiFi.
customer_reviews.author: Tommmmie

customer_reviews.title: Mini cloud
customer_reviews.text: Decent firmware, easy to configure but has enough options through advanced configuration to do what I needed. 2TB storage makes it a good place to store and backup my media files and documents. It acts as a media server so I'm able to stream stored media to my phone and laptop
customer_reviews.author: Grandrapidite

customer_reviews.title: stolen guts from inside router !
customer_reviews.text: Super pissed . I had to crack open up this thing to realize it did NOT have a HDD inside as advertized. Someone stole it from inside the router apparently and returned it back to amazon so I'm left with a router I cant use or return.
customer_reviews.author: joshua faucett

customer_reviews.title: Easy Set up!
customer_reviews.text: So far we are very happy with this router. We have alot of wireless things in our home between laptops and ipods, etc. We kept freezing up with our other router. This was easy to set up and has made our wireless experiences more of a positive time than a frustrating time.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle G.

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: When we first bought the router, it worked very well for two months. Then it must have had a firmware update, because it began dropping connections and needing to be restarted. This went on for about a year, and my first review of this product was quite negative. They must have done another firmware update, because for the last year, I have rarely needed to restart the router at all. I'm quite happy with this now.
customer_reviews.author: cecilia newell

customer_reviews.title: Complete waste of money!
customer_reviews.text: Great concept, but completely unreliable! I have gone through two of these, and every single one dropped the WiFi connection daily, and had to me restarted on a daily basis. The worst part would be dropping the WiFi, while making VOIP calls for work while on meeting calls. Talk about embarrassing, nothing like being on a conference call with your VP, only to have the WiFi drop, and lose your call. Do not buy this router, I am now out the money for this unusable router and matching WiFi extender!
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Time and Money
customer_reviews.text: This device did not work and refused to maintain a network connection. It was also not visible as a drive on any computer (Windows, Linux, Chromebook).
customer_reviews.author: russ5811

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to like it...
customer_reviews.text: Poor reception around my 1,000 sq. ft apartment. Would loose connection a couple times a week. Tried to use the internal storage but the software seemed cumbersom. Save yourself the hassel and your money. There are better routers out there.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Does not last enough
customer_reviews.text: I am replacing this unit after a year of figuring out What happened with my home network?. I just noticed that the problem was this router, and the problem is even worse when it overheats. And yes, the built in fan is not enough so I added an extra one, it did not fix the frequent drops in speed and connection with my 30 Mbps internet connection.
customer_reviews.author: Gamer Doc

customer_reviews.title: Worst router ever!
customer_reviews.text: the worst router ever... really expensive, is not working properly, it doesn't have any support... I really put my money into the trash. Don't buy it!!! this 80something dollars brick is so far the worst of all my shopping experiences at amazon. But for the fair play, I should have read the comments before I press the "place your order" button.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Mario Reyes Rojas

customer_reviews.title: nice wireless with backup
customer_reviews.text: this works well. has automatic back up setting that are nice also able to drag and drop what you want on the hard drive. easy to set up comes with a lot of software. can access the hard drive from anywhere
customer_reviews.author: nick pfister

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best router ever having the cloud feature is so worth the price. We were able to free up a ton a space on our computers and I love the mobile access you get by downloading the iphone app!
customer_reviews.author: Audra Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Good...
customer_reviews.text: I was thinking about other thing, it was very difficult for configuration, it's getting hot very fast, i'm afraid could be over heating. It isn't what I was looking for.-
customer_reviews.author: Omar Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: good range - but still trying to get it to port forward to the rest of the network
customer_reviews.author: H C Skinner

customer_reviews.title: Data transfer rates are terrible
customer_reviews.text: I tried updating the firmware but even with a direct wired connection the transfer rates were terrible. I tried connecting using the WD Cloud from my iPhone but that kept asking for a sys admin password that none of the documentation was able to tell me. The support forum also did not help much. I have subsequently sent it for replacement to Western Digital. Hopefully the new ones are better.
customer_reviews.author: Ashutosh Bhalerao

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not great
customer_reviews.text: Set up was more confusing than what I was hoping for. Overall it gets the job done and does what I need/want it to. The transfer speeds was a lot slower than I would expect it to be. Took several minutes to transfer movies, while older external drives only took 30 seconds or so in comparison. Has a lot of features that I probably will not use.
customer_reviews.author: Mills Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: Mixed review
customer_reviews.text: Router function is reasonable, but incredibly slow upload to onboard storage
customer_reviews.author: Bob M.

customer_reviews.title: Easy hookup and good signal
customer_reviews.text: Fast and easy to setup and wifi to whole house is working well. Pleased so far. Good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: D. P.

customer_reviews.title: I'm very glad of My Net N900 Central (2TB version)
customer_reviews.text: I'm very glad of My Net N900 Central (2TB version). PROS: [+] Very easy to setup (just Turn & Work!) [+] Good quality hardware [+] High routing speeds CONS: [-] Does not have tools for monitoring and maintance of internal hard disk
customer_reviews.author: Vitalii Kravchenko

customer_reviews.title: Almost there
customer_reviews.text: Very good, really delivers the quality of signal it promisses and is very easy to use and setup. Just could not make it work with Time Machine on my Mac, and neither Apple or WD supports it. I'm having to dig in forums to find a solution and coudn't solve it yet :(
customer_reviews.author: Kennedy Cintra

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it.
customer_reviews.text: Transfer rato from and to internal HDD is too slow, 6MB/s. The system hungs offen. I don't recomend, void it.
customer_reviews.author: renato.osh

customer_reviews.title: 100% satisfied despite bad software
customer_reviews.text: Amazing piece of technology and easy to use. The entire family gets use out of it. I never loose my connection to the internet but the "smart ware" software it comes with always disconnects to the router making the app useless. You can get around that by just using file explorer to access it or back your files up.
customer_reviews.author: D.C. Yost

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Kept dropping the signal, had to replace it after a year
customer_reviews.author: R Christian

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: using it as a personal cloud for the kids and their homework. media player plays most of the stuff you need with streaming through PS3. yes I would recommend to a friend
customer_reviews.author: Fargo B. Hall

customer_reviews.title: My unit worked for about a day and then died
customer_reviews.text: I set the entire thing up and was satisfied with the way it was working, then the router stopped working and there was no way for me to change settings or get to the files I had copied to the hard drive. I sent it back and Amazon refunded my money.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: excellent addition to the network
customer_reviews.text: took some time to configure with my existing system but works well now and increased my wireless speeds. is easier to use with mybook usb storage but works fine with the mybook live system too.
customer_reviews.author: Brenna Sands

customer_reviews.title: Very Good
customer_reviews.text: Now I am able to connect around 5 systems through my NET N900. It is giving comfort of WiFI for all our family members.
customer_reviews.author: sid

customer_reviews.title: Wd router my net N900
customer_reviews.text: It constantly goes off-line. I was connected to someone else time capsule much better. I never went off-line and it was faster.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Useful Gadget for Home Entertainment
customer_reviews.text: One Thumb Up! I recommend this storage router for the one who like home entertainment such as reviewing photo albums, video clips, musics, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Seykas KHUN

customer_reviews.title: Good potential but poor manual and unmatured utilites
customer_reviews.text: Good hardware, but there are some questions to software part of the product: 1) It's absolutely unclear from the manuals, how to connect USB Printer for Mac OS. Well, there is no problem to install "WD Print Share" and get Printer "Connected" status. But how to set up Printer in MAC OS System Preferences/Printers is absolutely undescribed. "Connected" printer is still invisible for applications. What options should be chosen for IPP, LPD, and Socket, etc is absolute enigma for users. 2) There is no any visible option (neither in Dashboard, not in Smartware) for internal HDD testing: scanning for disk errors, etc. 3 stars in general.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Slow
customer_reviews.text: It is was it says it is, but after one week i still don't have all my files backed up. I also expected to access all files from all PCs in the house. I haven't figured that out yet if its possible.
customer_reviews.author: Rich Williams

customer_reviews.title: storage useless
customer_reviews.text: the included storage is the reason i bought this router - reading/writing is SUPER slow. would not recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Sewon

customer_reviews.title: xmas gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a great price and arrived on time! husband hasn't used it yet but he was very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh A. Almanza

product_meta.title: WD My Net N900 Central HD Dual Band Router 1TB Storage WiFi Wireless Router
product_meta.description:
Size:1 TBMy Net N900 Central HD Dual-Band Storage Router accelerates your HD entertainment with exclusive FasTrack Plus technology. Built-in storage with automatic backup software lets you stream, surf, play while your files are wirelessly backed up. It offers up to 450 + 450 Mbps Wi-Fi speed, 4 Gigabit ports and superior range for the ultimate HD entertainment.

AMAZON.COM




FROM THE MANUFACTURER


MY NET N900 CENTRAL HD DUAL-BAND STORAGE ROUTER – ALL-IN-ONE EFFORTLESS HD ENTERTAINMENT WITH INTERNAL STORAGE FOR BACKUP.
 Accelerate your entertainment and protect your data with My Net N900 Central HD Dual-Band Storage Router. Fastrack Plus technology delivers smart, real-time prioritization of entertainment traffic while the automatic backup software wirelessly backs up all the PCs in your network to the built-in hard drive. It features combined wireless speeds up to 900 Mbps, 4 Gigabit ports and one USB port.

Accelerate what entertains you.
FasTrack Plus makes these routers even smarter. It instantly analyzes and prioritizes all network traffic and provides more bandwidth to the services that need it, for a brilliant HD experience. Top-of-the-line performance. 
Up to 450 + 450 Mbps speed with dual 2.4 and 5 GHz bands working simultaneously. With superior range-amplifying technology this router provides the best range for larger multi-floor homes. Automatic backup.
Wireless backup personal files to the built-in storage from all the computers in your home. Set it and forget. Performance and security all-in-one HD wireless router. 

Technology:
Brilliant HD streaming with FasTrack Plus - This technology doesn't just recognize pre-identified popular services and standard data packets like traditional routers. FasTrack Plus instantly analysis and prioritizes all movies, videos, games and chat sessions delivering faster, smoother, HD streaming with more efficient load times - even when it's all happening at the same time.

Built-in hard drive for wireless backup - With 1 or 2 TB of storage built-in, now it's easy and convenient to back up all the personal files from all the computers in your home. Set it and forget. WD's included backup software will automatically and continuously back up your data over your wireless network.

Speed that keeps up with you - With Dual-Band speeds up to 450 Mbps on both the 2.4 and 5 GHz bands, My Net N900 Central delivers the ultimate Wi-Fi speeds for your entertainment.*

* Maximum wireless performance rate derived from IEEE standard 802.11 specifications. Actual data throughput and wireless coverage may vary based on wireless network capacity, data throughput rate, range and coverage. Performance depends on factors including distance from the access point, volume of network traffic, building materials and construction, operating system used, configuration of wireless products used, interference and other adverse conditions. As used for transfer rate or interface, Megabits per second (Mbps) = 1 million bits per second, Gigabits per second (Gbps) = 1 billion bits per second.

More bandwidth, less interference - Double your bandwidth with 2.4 and 5 GHz bands working simultaneously to increase throughput. Additionally, the 5 GHz band offers a dedicated network that streams your entertainment without interference.

Superior coverage - Range-amplifying technology reduces interference and additional antennas broaden the wireless signal to provide superior coverage for larger, multi-floor homes. Stream your movies, shows, games, videos and music to all the laptops, tablets and smartphones anywhere in your home.

4 Gigabit Ethernet ports - With 4 Gigabit Ethernet ports you have plenty of high-speed ports at 10x the speed over Fast Ethernet for your connected devices - HD game boxes, media players, Blu-ray Disc players and more.

USB port - The convenient USB port makes it easy to add external storage such as My Book or My Passport hard drives, shared printers, scanners and other USB devices to your network.

Software:
More control - My Net Dashboard makes it easy for you to customize, monitor or change your network settings. Access parental controls, Internet security, network name and password, printer and scanner settings, and connected storage drive settings all in one easy view.

 Parental controls and Internet security - Use the available parental controls to limit the type of websites your children can view, set access and time limits for their web access and set Internet security to prevent malware and spyware attacks.

Keep your network up and running - The included network diagnostics tool monitors your network for you. It shows how many devices are on your network, continually analyzes common network connectivity issues and helps correct them when they occur so you are back up and running quickly.

Share your network with guests - Set up your own secure wireless hotspot in your home so your guests can wirelessly access your network. Password protection allows you to control access to just wireless web browsing.

Setup
Easy setup - WD's streamlined CD or browser setup is designed to get you up and running in minutes with just a few quick steps. You can set up your router with the included easy setup CD or set it up wirelessly with a browser on any of your connected devices. The intuitive user interface is designed for touch screens, making setting up your router on a smartphone or tablet a snap.

Easily connect and expand your network - With UPnP, it's easy to discover and auto-configure other devices on your network to provide the ultimate entertainment experience.

Create your own personal cloud- Access your files, music and photos with your smartphones and tablets using WD 2go free file viewer and WD Photos free photo viewer mobile apps. Connect My Net 900 Central with its built-in hard drive for an instant personal cloud solution. Keep your files safe at home and always with you.

Push button setup (WPS) - Easily connect new devices to your wireless network with the push of a button. It's as easy as syncing your mobile phone to your Bluetooth device, and within seconds you can expand your network to include PCs, smartphones, tablets, and other UPnP enabled wireless devices.

Advanced QoS (WMM)- In addition to industry-standard Advanced QoS which prioritizes devices, My Net routers feature exclusive FasTrack Plus technology that delivers smart, real-time prioritization of Internet movies, shows, games and video chat for the smoothest possible HD entertainment streaming.

WPA/WPA2, SPI firewall - We protect your wireless network with WPA/WPA2 and SPI firewall security. Only the data you want gets through, hackers are blocked, and your network is protected.

Antenna amplifiers - Built into the sleek design of the routers are multiple antenna amplifiers that help boost the router's range so that you get excellent coverage and speed in almost any size home.

IPv6-enabled - Future-proof your network with support for the latest Internet Protocol technology.

Ideal for

 * Upgrading to smart HD dual-band speeds
 * Wirelessly backing up your personal files from any PC in your network
 * Smoothly streaming HD entertainment to smart TVs, tablets, smartphones, computers and other connected devices
 * Multimedia households with multiple connected devices
 * Viewing photos and files with your tablet or smartphone
 * Connecting to your home network in just a few quick steps
 * Quickly connecting new devices to your wireless network with the push of a button
 * Setting up parental controls and Internet security to keep your family and network safe
 * Providing guest access to your home Wi-Fi network
 * Expanding your wired network at 10/100/1000 Gigabit speeds
 * Connecting external storage, shared printers or scanners and other USB devices

What's in the box
HD dual-band storage router, Setup and resource CD, Ethernet cable, Power adapter, Quick Install Guide.

System Requirements 
CD setup for PC: Windows 7, Windows Vista, Windows XP (SP3)
Web setup for Mac: Safari 2 or higher and type in //wdrouter or 192.168.1.1
Supported browsers for setup and advanced settings: Internet Explorer 7, Safari 2, Firefox 2, Google Chrome 7 or higher. Type in //wdrouter or 192.168.1.1
Note: Compatibility may vary depending on user's hardware configuration and operating system.

For more great WD products, visit the Western Digital Store at Amazon.com

Features at a glance

 * Auto-prioritizes all entertainment services for accelerated HD streaming
 * Built-in WD hard drive for storage and wireless backup
 * Dual-band 2.4 and 5 GHz bands double your bandwidth and reduce interference
 * Superior multi-floor coverage with range-amplifying technology
 * WD 2go and WD Photos remote access 
 * Smartphone and tablet friendly for viewing photos and files
 * 4 Gigabit Ethernet ports for viewing photos and files 
 * USB port for connecting shared printers or scanners 
 * Parental controls, Internet security and guest access
 * Network diagnostics to help monitor your network status and repair it quickly as needed






Wireless Routers 
Comparison Chart My Net N600 My Net N750 My Net N900 My Net N900 Central Fast HD streaming with simple setup. Seamless HD streaming for watching movies on multiple devices. Smart HD streaming for accelerated video to all your Wi-Fi devices. Smart HD streaming for accelerated video plus internal storage for wireless backup. Wi-Fi speed up to 300 + 300 Mbps up to 300 + 450 Mbps up to 450 + 450 Mbps up to 450 + 450 Mbps Dual-band 2.4 and 5 GHz 2.4 and 5 GHz 2.4 and 5 GHz 2.4 and 5 GHz Ethernet ports 4 Fast Ethernet 4 Gigabit Ethernet 7 Gigabit Ethernet 4 Gigabit Ethernet USB ports 1 2 2 1 Advanced QoS Tablet and smartphone friendly IPv6-enabled UPnP/DLNA WPA/WPA2 Security Simultaneous HD streaming Prioritization technology for accelerated HD Streaming FasTrack FasTrack FasTrack Plus FasTrack Plus WD 2go WD Photos Internal Storage Wireless backup 

See more
feature_bullets: FasTrack Plus technology accelerates your entertainment
View and share your files with WD 2go remote access

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.3 out of 5 stars114 ratings3.3 out of 5 stars
